archimate:BusinessObject.name: Business Information
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
DESCRIPTION: Organizationally constructed meaning describing business facts, assets, or opinions that are exchanged in the context of a public service to support its delivery. Examples include an invoice, a medical prescription, a driving license.
Based on TOGAF guide about business capabilities and TOGAF definition of information. https://www2.opengroup.org/ogsys/catalog/g161 http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/togaf9-doc/arch/
Syn. Business Facts, Business Data, Business Opinions
INTEROPERABILITY SALIENCY: IoP Dimension: Behavioral IoP The Business Information ABB Â is salient for organisational interoperability because it represents the entity being exchanged between organisations. Its interoperability needs to be guaranteed by means of organisational and semantic interoperability specifications.
EXAMPLES: The following implementation is an example on how this specific Architecture Building Block (ABB) can be instantiated as a Solution Building Block (SBB):
Surveillance3 - Surveillance information Published Surveillance information (Business Information) on Europa: Textile category 1 - Cotton yarn, not put up for retail sale [Council Regulation (EEC) No 3030/93] from Belarus in 2015: see URL for details. http://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/dds2/surv/surv_data_list.jsp?Lang=en&survNumber=670010&survType=1&startDate=20150101&originCode=BY
